评论概述: Size up may be necessary for curvy bodies
评论详情: First off this is a very cute skirt with built in shorts.  I usually wear an xl but decided to size up to xxl mainly because I have a larger butt and skirts are always short in the back. Sizing up helped with that.  I do note that the shorts underneath are a great quality of material but my large thighs make them roll up but that’s okay because you can’t see it when wearing the skirt.  The waist band is a tiny bit tight even tho I sized up, so if you have a more curvy sized body and usually wear xl then I would suggest sizing up just to make sure it’s not too small.  Overall it’s very cute and flattering def suggest buying if you are looking for a cute skirt with shorts under it, fabric material is very soft and comfy as well

They do have pockets built in the shorts underneath and they fit true to size.

评论概述: Super cute but beware the white
评论详情: I got the pink and white set and they are adorable! I love the fit and the fabric is very light and cooling for a day outside in the Florida heat. Only bad part is the white pair is very see through!! The shorts underneath are sheer and depending on your underwear you can see them through the skirt layer too. A good nude pair and I think they’re fine, I wore them all day like that and my boyfriend said he couldn’t tell. The pink pair is not as bad but I still wouldn’t wear black underwear. Overall for the price I would defintely like to get more of them, maybe in some darker colors next time lol.
